verses.verse: And Mosheh <WH4872> gathered <WH6950> all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> together <WH6950> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, These are the words <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, that ye should do <WH6213> <WH8800> them.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shall work <WH4399> be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> there shall be to you an holy day <WH6944>, a sabbath <WH7676> of rest <WH7677> to the YY <WH3068>: whosoever doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> work <WH4399> therein shall be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.
Ye shall kindle <WH1197> <WH8762> no fire <WH784> throughout your habitations <WH4186> upon the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the thing <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8798> ye from among you an offering <WH8641> unto the YY <WH3068>: whosoever <WH3605> is of a willing <WH5081> heart <WH3820>, let him bring <WH935> <WH8686> it, an offering <WH8641> of the YY <WH3068>; gold <WH2091>, and silver <WH3701>, and brass <WH5178>,
And blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats <WH5795> ' hair,
And rams <WH352> ' skins <WH5785> dyed red <WH119> <WH8794>, and badgers <WH8476> ' skins <WH5785>, and shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086>,
And oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, and spices <WH1314> for anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>,
And onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394> for the ephod <WH646>, and for the breastplate <WH2833>.
And every wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> among you shall come <WH935> <WH8799>, and make <WH6213> <WH8799> all that the YY <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>;
The tabernacle <WH4908>, his tent <WH168>, and his covering <WH4372>, his taches <WH7165>, and his boards <WH7175>, his bars <WH1280>, his pillars <WH5982>, and his sockets <WH134>,
The ark <WH727>, and the staves <WH905> thereof, with the mercy seat <WH3727>, and the vail <WH6532> of the covering <WH4539>,
The table <WH7979>, and his staves <WH905>, and all his vessels <WH3627>, and the shewbread <WH6440> <WH3899>,
The candlestick <WH4501> also for the light <WH3974>, and his furniture <WH3627>, and his Menorahs <WH5216>, with the oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>,

And the incense <WH7004> altar <WH4196>, and his staves <WH905>, and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door at the entering in <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH4908>,
The altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930>, with his brasen <WH5178> grate <WH4345>, his staves <WH905>, and all his vessels <WH3627>, the laver <WH3595> and his foot <WH3653>,
The hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, his pillars <WH5982>, and their sockets <WH134>, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH8179> of the court <WH2691>,
The pins <WH3489> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the pins <WH3489> of the court <WH2691>, and their cords <WH4340>,

The cloths <WH899> of service <WH8278>, to do service <WH8334> <WH8763> in the holy <WH6944> place, the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aharon <WH175> the Kohen <WH3548>, and the garments <WH899> of his sons <WH1121>, to minister in the Kohen's office <WH3547> <WH8763>.
And all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> departed <WH3318> <WH8799> from the presence <WH6440> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

And they came <WH935> <WH8799>, every one <WH376> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> stirred him up <WH5375> <WH8804>, and every one whom his spirit <WH7307> made willing <WH5068> <WH8804>, and they brought <WH935> <WH8689> the YY'S <WH3068> offering <WH8641> to the work <WH4399> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and for all his service <WH5656>, and for the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899>.

And they came <WH935> <WH8799>, both <WH5921> men <WH582> and women <WH802>, as many as <WH3605> were willing <WH5081> hearted <WH3820>, and brought <WH935> <WH8689> bracelets <WH2397>, and earrings <WH5141>, and rings <WH2885>, and tablets <WH3558>, all jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>: and every man <WH376> that offered <WH5130> <WH8689> offered an offering <WH8573> of gold <WH2091> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And every man <WH376>, with whom was found <WH4672> <WH8738> blue <WH8504>, and purple <WH713>, and scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen <WH8336>, and goats <WH5795> ' hair, and red <WH119> <WH8794> skins <WH5785> of rams <WH352>, and badgers <WH8476> ' skins <WH5785>, brought <WH935> <WH8689> them.

Havahry one that did offer <WH7311> <WH8688> an offering <WH8641> of silver <WH3701> and brass <WH5178> brought <WH935> <WH8689> the YY'S <WH3068> offering <WH8641>: and every man, with whom was found <WH4672> <WH8738> shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086> for any work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656>, brought <WH935> <WH8689> it.

And all the women <WH802> that were wise <WH2450> hearted <WH3820> did spin <WH2901> <WH8804> with their hands <WH3027>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> that which they had spun <WH4299>, both of blue <WH8504>, and of purple <WH713>, and of scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and of fine linen <WH8336>.
And all the women <WH802> whose heart <WH3820> stirred <WH5375> <WH8804> them up in wisdom <WH2451> spun <WH2901> <WH8804> goats <WH5795> ' hair.
And the rulers <WH5387> brought <WH935> <WH8689> onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68>, and stones <WH68> to be set <WH4394>, for the ephod <WH646>, and for the breastplate <WH2833>;
And spice <WH1314>, and oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, and for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and for the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>.

The children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> brought <WH935> <WH8689> a willing offering <WH5071> unto the YY <WH3068>, every man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> made them willing <WH5068> <WH8804> to bring <WH935> <WH8687> for all manner of work <WH4399>, which the YY <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> to be made <WH6213> <WH8800> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, the YY <WH3068> hath called <WH7121> <WH8804> by name <WH8034> Bezaleel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri <WH221>, the son <WH1121> of Hur <WH2354>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Y'hudah <WH3063>;

And he hath filled <WH4390> <WH8762> him with the spirit <WH7307> of 'Elohim <WH430>, in wisdom <WH2451>, in understanding <WH8394>, and in knowledge <WH1847>, and in all manner of workmanship <WH4399>;
And to devise <WH2803> <WH8800> curious works <WH4284>, to work <WH6213> <WH8800> in gold <WH2091>, and in silver <WH3701>, and in brass <WH5178>,
And in the cutting <WH2799> of stones <WH68>, to set <WH4390> <WH8763> them, and in carving <WH2799> of wood <WH6086>, to make <WH6213> <WH8800> any manner of cunning <WH4284> work <WH4399>.

And he hath put <WH5414> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820> that he may teach <WH3384> <WH8687>, both he, and Aholiab <WH171>, the son <WH1121> of Ahisamach <WH294>, of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>.

Them hath he filled <WH4390> <WH8765> with wisdom <WH2451> of heart <WH3820>, to work <WH6213> <WH8800> all manner of work <WH4399>, of the engraver <WH2796>, and of the cunning workman <WH2803> <WH8802>, and of the embroiderer <WH7551> <WH8802>, in blue <WH8504>, and in purple <WH713>, in scarlet <WH8144> <WH8438>, and in fine linen <WH8336>, and of the weaver <WH707> <WH8802>, even of them that do <WH6213> <WH8802> any <WH3605> work <WH4399>, and of those that devise <WH2803> <WH8802> cunning work <WH4284>.
